swSurveillanceVLANMIB.name: swSurveillanceVLANMIB
swSurveillanceVLANMIB.description: The surveillance VLAN module MIB for the proprietary enterprise.

swSurveillanceVlanId.name: swSurveillanceVlanId
swSurveillanceVlanId.description: The VLAN ID of the surveillance VLAN. The surveillance VLAN is used to assign VLANs for untagged video packets. The value zero is for display only and not configurable, which means there is no surveillance VLAN on the switch.

swSurveillanceVlanGlobalState.name: swSurveillanceVlanGlobalState
swSurveillanceVlanGlobalState.description: This object indicates the global status of the surveillance VLAN. If we enable the surveillance VLAN, we should set the VID first.

swSurveillanceVlanPriority.name: swSurveillanceVlanPriority
swSurveillanceVlanPriority.description: The priority for the surveillance VLAN, which is used to distinguish the QoS of the surveillance traffic from data traffic.

swSurveillanceVlanAgingTime.name: swSurveillanceVlanAgingTime
swSurveillanceVlanAgingTime.description: The aging time for the surveillance VLAN, which is used to remove a port from a surveillance VLAN when the working mode is auto.

swSurveillanceVlanLogState.name: swSurveillanceVlanLogState
swSurveillanceVlanLogState.description: This object indicates the surveillance VLAN log state.

swSurveillanceVlanDynamicPortlist.name: swSurveillanceVlanDynamicPortlist
swSurveillanceVlanDynamicPortlist.description: The surveillance VLAN's member ports that dynamically joined the surveillance VLAN from a learned surveillance device.

swSurveillanceVlanDeviceTable.name: swSurveillanceVlanDeviceTable
swSurveillanceVlanDeviceTable.description: The management information of a surveillance VLAN member port's device.

swSurveillanceVlanDeviceEntry.name: swSurveillanceVlanDeviceEntry
swSurveillanceVlanDeviceEntry.description: The information from the surveillance device connected to the switch.

swSurveillanceVlanDevStartTime.name: swSurveillanceVlanDevStartTime
swSurveillanceVlanDevStartTime.description: The time the surveillance device first connected to the switch.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiTable.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiTable
swSurveillanceVlanOuiTable.description: The management information of the surveillance VLAN OUI.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiEntry.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiEntry
swSurveillanceVlanOuiEntry.description: The management information of the OUI of a surveillance VLAN domain. An OUI contains information about the type of IP phone that can make use of the OUI to check the surveillance traffic.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiAddr.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiAddr
swSurveillanceVlanOuiAddr.description: The address of the OUI referring to this swSurveillanceVlanOuiEntry.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiMask.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiMask
swSurveillanceVlanOuiMask.description: The OUI mask indicates the valid bit of the OUI address.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiComponentType.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiComponentType
swSurveillanceVlanOuiComponentType.description: The Component type of the OUI.

swSurveillanceVlanOuiRowStatus.name: swSurveillanceVlanOuiRowStatus
swSurveillanceVlanOuiRowStatus.description: This object indicates the status of this entry.

swSurveillanceVlanPortTable.name: swSurveillanceVlanPortTable
swSurveillanceVlanPortTable.description: The management of the surveillance VLAN function on all bridge ports. Some ports are not member ports of a surveillance VLAN, but they may be added in auto mode. Therefore, this function enables both current surveillance VLAN member ports and non-VLAN member ports to be managed.

swSurveillanceVlanPortEntry.name: swSurveillanceVlanPortEntry
swSurveillanceVlanPortEntry.description: The management of the surveillance VLAN function on ports

swSurveillanceVlanPortNumber.name: swSurveillanceVlanPortNumber
swSurveillanceVlanPortNumber.description: Bridge ports can be configured with surveillance VLAN function.

swSurveillanceVlanPortState.name: swSurveillanceVlanPortState
swSurveillanceVlanPortState.description: The port state here indicates whether the port supports the surveillance VLAN function. We can enable/disable the surveillance VLAN function on the port.
